name: Glacial
description:
With this series of images, I seek to create a document of the elusive and vanishing nature in the high arctic that I was lucky enough to experience myself.

Glaciers and icebergs are incredibly slow titans but constantly moving, evolving and changing. Our limited sense of time makes this difficult to see, however. With AI-Animation we gain the ability to render the process of change visible and possible to experience.

These AI-Landscapes have been imagined by the IceGAN-neural network that was trained with my photographs from various endeavors to Greenland and Iceland where I captured thousands of images of glaciers and icebergs in different shapes and sizes.
